column2: application to have another date to support his application.  Thereafter,3rd
defendant-respondent-petitioner,  by the  petition  dated  19.03.2014  sought

column1: permission  of this  Court  to  receive  and  admit  new  evidence  in  terms  of

submissions in writing as well on the issue of receiving fresh evidence.
